description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d99as","text":"Magnetic bead cleaning of PCR products, adapted for Cytiva Sera-Mag Select beads. Forked from an older protocol using AMPure XP beads with minimal changes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

fork_info.title: Magnetic bead cleaning of PCR products

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"73rgl","text":"Work at post-PCR lab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4v00d","text":"You can use PCR tubes/strips or PCR-plates but for easiest work with magnetic beads flat-bottom 96-well microplates are recommended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1i825","text":"Calculate the volume needed for the beads. For normal length primers a bead:sample ratio of 0.8:1 is likely OK. For long primers you can use a ratio of down to 0.65:1 (probably even lower). If you can still see primer dimers on a gel after cleanup, try a lower bead:sample ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8pmq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ir6m","text":"0.8 * sample volume =","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29brn","text":"Shake the magnetic bead buffer bottle to fully resuspend magnetic particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2p1qn","text":"Add magnetic beads. Pipette mix 10 times and Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dir6r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"9B591F53D57849E6A28AFA6A9250BDCB","id":"16306","label":"","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3160h","text":"Place the reaction plate onto a Magnet Plate for 2 minutes to separate beads from solution. (Keep on the magnet plate until step 11).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"at8n3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"120","guid":"54F0F6B9BA6041BABB04ADBFB47B1F2E","id":"16307","label":""}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fjjug","text":"Aspirate the supernatant from the reaction plate and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pirn","text":"Add 40 μL of elution buffer (PCR water or 10mM Tris), pipette mix 10 times. Make sure the buffer reaches up to the beads!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dr2u7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","guid":"BCBCA93CF36B4BC39501E0A22348EC0E","id":"7332","label":"","unit":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amnk9","text":"Place the reaction plate onto a Magnet Plate for 1 minute to separate beads from solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8012q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"60","guid":"82907AEC4208430CAAF42100DEAB70DD","id":"16308","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2isi4","text":"Transfer purified product to a new PCR plate or strips. Ensure that no beads are carried over when transferring, as it may inhibit later steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1k7aq","text":"Dispense 200 μL of 85% ethanol and incubate at room temperature for at least 30 seconds. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. You can discard the ethanol by inverting the plate keeping the magnetic plate on the bottom of it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anstg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avrfa","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"73D21C2E5E0F4011AF52BB90B2AB7786","id":"7333","label":"","unit":"1"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"30","guid":"EC9DABAF2A3B412C81E2D9C3BC6D6556","id":"16309","label":"","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbj8m","text":"Dry off the remaining ethanol. To speed up the process, you can place the plate on a warm (30°C) heat block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"86upq","text":"Drying takes at least 30 minutes. Check that drying was complete before continuing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"evdvl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"A724A25A1D6241E1B91DD9E7C13390DB","id":"16310","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gi3a","text":"Repeat the washing step as above: dispense 200 μL of 85% ethanol and incubate at room temperature for at least 30 seconds. Aspirate out the ethanol and discard. You can discard the ethanol by inverting the plate keeping the magnetic plate on the bottom of it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k1en","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"580bb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"5134E1CC67F248ACB84A1758A1195A61","id":"7334","label":"","unit":"1"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"30","guid":"58E85F9D416F4FC8A4BAFBF4BC88DFA5","id":"16311","label":"","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuc22","text":"Prepare 85% ethanol. You need 400 µl per sample, but prepare some extra. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg57t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13d2v","text":"Remember that when mixing ethanol and water, the total volume decreases (e.g. 15 ml water + 85 ml 100% ethanol \u003c 100ml 85% ethanol). For the same reason, measure ethanol and water separately before mixing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Magnetic bead cleaning of PCR products with Cytiva Sera-Mag Select
